Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1534.....C PORT NOT WORKING
threads.message:
hi...i have a A1534 MACBOOK PRO..the problm is c type not working in one position...but when i connect reversly...its working
i will attach the photos

threads.title: A1534.....C PORT NOT WORKING
threads.message: part no  is 820-00045-11...........there is no liquid damge...c port also looks fine.....any idea...?

threads.title: A1534.....C PORT NOT WORKING
threads.message:
There must be a problem with CC1/2 lines.
Check U7860/65.
